item.title: The Song of Soil
item.description: We, the angry maelstroms, raged battles across our mindscapes against the ghosts of those who never really existed while seeking allies in those who had yet to come. We, the pinpoints of thought, sailed sleepily through the sea of silence each believing in the other while doubting in ourselves. We, the dreams of God, lay in wait to be awakened.
